dmca.title: Fw: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Carlos Anibarro [mailto:cae@bolivia-internet.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, July 19, 2006 6:12 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website
Subject: Fw: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website
Importance: High


Dear sirs

2 days ago i addressed this complaint to abuse@theplanet.com who redirected me to you.

The site "putalocura.com" hosted in this server:
92.ca.5646.static.theplanet.com (70.86.202.146)

has a photo of me on this url:
http://www.putalocura.com/variedades/bochornosas/192.html
Placed there without any authorization from myself.
Besides the fact this site has XXX info and nothing related to me, they are
offending myself with the ilgal use of this photograph

I will appreciate this situation can be taken and my photograph can be taken from
that site.

Kindly regards

_______________________________
Carlos Anibarro
Bolivia en Internet
mailto:cae@bolivia-internet.com
http://www.bolivia-internet.com

----- Original Message -----
From: <abuse@theplanet.com>
To: <cae@bolivia-internet.com>
Sent: Monday, July 17, 2006 06:14
Subject: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website


> Reference: [TP-C182777U]
>
> copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright 
> infringement reports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at the 
> address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find their 
> direct contact information at this URL:
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
> -- 
> Thank you,
>
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
>
> ==== Original Message ====

> client-ip=70.103.189.17; envelope-from=cae@bolivia-internet.com;

> client-ip=70.87.6.110; envelope-from=cae@bolivia-internet.com; 
> helo=smtp01.theplanet.com;
>
> MIME element (text/plain)
> Dear sirs
>
> I was scared to death when a friend reported to me that a website, an XXX
> website with discusting content waspublishing one of my photos.
> Regardless to say, this photo is 100% unauthorized and probably was copyed
> from one of my websites
> My picture appears here (im the one with the computer at the bottom):
> http://www.putalocura.com/variedades/bochornosas/192.html
> This "brazy bich"(putalocura) site runs on one of your servers:
> 92.ca.5646.static.theplanet.com (70.86.202.146)
>
> I have asked the webmaster a weekago to remove my picture with no reply at
> all, so im including below the new email i sent him this morning too.
>
> Is there any action it can be taken with this account/user? he is using my
> photo without any authorization, in a XXX site and all that, I know you 
> can
> understand the implications.
>
> Thank you very much i will be looking forward for your answer
>
> Kindly regards
>
> _______________________________
> Carlos Anibarro
> Bolivia en Internet
> mailto:cae@bolivia-internet.com
> http://www.bolivia-internet.com
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Carlos Anibarro" <cae@bolivia-internet.com>
> To: <webmaster@putalocura.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 17, 2006 09:06
> Subject: Imagen no autorizada
>
>
>> Estimados seÃ±ores
>>
>> Un amigo me hizo referencia a esta pagina:
>> http://www.putalocura.com/variedades/bochornosas/192.html
>> en la que aparece mi foto de manera ilegal (con el computador)
>> Les agradecere mucho eliminar mi foto de ahi.
>>
>> Atentamente
>> _______________________________
>> Carlos Anibarro
